mapper.select:
SELECT page.id, page.`name`, page.url, page.is_menu, page.is_default, page.icon_class, page.parent_id, parent.`name` AS parent_name, page.order_num, page.remark, p.can_insert, p.can_delete, p.can_update, p.can_select FROM `sys_page` page LEFT OUTER JOIN `sys_permission` p ON page.id = p.sys_page_id LEFT OUTER JOIN `sys_role` r ON r.id = p.sys_role_id LEFT OUTER JOIN `sys_admin` a ON a.sys_role_id = r.id LEFT OUTER JOIN `sys_page` parent ON page.parent_id = parent.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.id=#{sysAdminId}
